name: Solar System (itch) (deblasei)
description:
This is my Solar System Project for Games and Interactivity. It has all the planets (Including Pluto the planet in our hearts), Comets, and a mini-map in the corner of the screen. I tried to keep to at least a somewhat scale for the plants, but other than that it isn;t all up to scale.

Created By - 

Isabella DeBlase
